Click

All a click track on top of any groove. Please note the variables listed below and their defaults.

The subroutines ClickOn and ClickOff are created. These can be used in a song file to enable/disable the clicking for sections using the commands "Call Clickon" or "Call Clickoff".

Notes:

There is NOT a TIME or TIMESIG setting in this groove. We use the existing groove value for that.

Since there is not a "SeqClear" in this file the current groove settings will not be changed. However, the name of the current groove "$_Groove" will be "Click". For this reason, call click before the wanted groove.

Variables

ClickTone1 The drum tone used on primary beats. Default: ShortHiWhistle
ClickTone2 The drum tone used on secondary beats. Default: ShortGuiro
ClickPattern The pattern 1, 13, 123 or 1234. Default: 1

  • Click

Click

A simple click track. (1)
Drum-Clicktrack1 ShortHiWhistle
